task.title: Making bacon and eggs
task.shortdesc: Something to do to satisfy your hunger.

taskbody.context: You'll need a stove, pan, spatula, silverware, a plate, bacon and eggs.

step.cmd: Turn the stove on low to medium heat.
Place the pan on the stove and wait for it to warm up.
Place your bacon on the pan (it should sizzle).
Cook the bacon until it's crispy.
Take the bacon off the pan with your spatula.
Place your bacon on your plate.
Remove about half of the bacon grease from your pan, you'll use the other half to cook your eggs.
Crack the eggs in your pan.
After a few more minutes, remove the eggs from your pan.
Place the eggs on your plate.
With your silverware, enjoy your freshly cooked bacon and eggs.
